Name: WWII Tanks: Battlefield
About the game: Immerse yourself in a world of armored tank battles. Choose from a wide range of famous tanks of the major combatants. Pick the best tank and blast your way across the battlefield. Defeat your enemies with force and strategic decisions! And lead your team on a glorious road to victory! Game Features: Wide selection of famous WWII tanks: Germany: Tiger 1 Panzer-IV Sdkfz251 MÃ¶rser Karl USSR: T-34/76 T-34/85 KV-I KV-II BT-7 T-35 Japan: Type 89 United Kingdom: Cromwell Sherman Firefly and many more. Missions: Battle of Stalingrad - Attack Battle of Stalingrad - Defense Escort Mission - Berlin Escort Mission - Berlin (General) Battle of Kursk - Axis Battle of Kursk - Allied Speed Battle - Berlin Escape from Berlin
